buffer.h

00001 #include "ext_critical.h"
00002 
00003 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00004     #pragma pack(push, 2)
00005 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00006     #pragma pack(2)
00007 #endif
00008 
00009 enum {
00010     MAXCHAN = 4
00011 };
00012 
00013 enum {
00014     bi_basefreq = 0,
00015     bi_detune,
00016     bi_lowfreq,
00017     bi_hifreq,
00018     bi_lowvel,
00019     bi_hivel,
00020     bi_gain,
00021     bi_numparams
00022 };
00023 
00024 typedef struct _buffer
00025 {
00026     t_object b_obj;     // doesn't have any signals so it doesn't need to be pxobject
00027     long b_valid;       // flag is off during read replacement or editing operation
00028     float *b_samples;   // stored with interleaved channels if multi-channel
00029     long b_frames;      // number of sample frames (each one is sizeof(float) * b_nchans bytes)
00030     long b_nchans;      // number of channels
00031     long b_size;        // size of buffer in floats
00032     float b_sr;         // sampling rate of the buffer
00033     float b_1oversr;    // 1 / sr
00034     float b_msr;        // sr * .001
00035     // Mac-specific stuff
00036     float *b_memory;    // pointer to where memory starts (initial padding for interp)
00037     t_symbol *b_name;
00038     short b_vol;
00039     short b_space;
00040     // looping info (from AIFF file)
00041     long b_susloopstart;    // in samples
00042     long b_susloopend;      // in samples
00043     long b_relloopstart;    // in samples
00044     long b_relloopend;      // in samples
00045     // instrument info (from AIFF file)
00046     short b_inst[bi_numparams];
00047     // window stuff
00048     void *b_wind;
00049     double b_pixperfr;
00050     double b_frperpix;
00051     long b_imagesize;
00052     Point b_scroll;
00053     long b_scrollscale;
00054     long b_selbegin[MAXCHAN];
00055     long b_selend[MAXCHAN];
00056     long b_zoom;
00057     long b_zim[11];
00058     void *b_mouseout;
00059     long b_format;          // 'AIFF' or 'Sd2f'
00060     t_symbol *b_filename;   // last file read (not written) for readagain message
00061     long b_oldnchans;       // used for resizing window in case of # of channels change
00062     void *b_doneout;
00063     long b_outputbytes;     // number of bytes used for output sample (1-4)
00064     long b_modtime;         // last modified time ("dirty" method)
00065     struct _buffer *b_peer; // objects that share this symbol (used as a link in the peers)
00066     Boolean b_owner;        // b_memory/b_samples "owned" by this object
00067     long b_outputfmt;       // sample type (A_LONG, A_FLOAT, etc.)
00068     long b_inuse;           // objects that use buffer should set this during their perform
00069     void *b_dspchain;       // dspchain used for this instance
00070 } t_buffer;
00071 
00072 #define BUFWIND(x) ((t_wind *)(x->b_wind))
00073 
00074 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00075     #pragma pack(pop)
00076 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00077     #pragma pack()
00078 #endif
